triples.name: Distributed artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper provides a scientific classification of distributed artificial intelligence systems and their fundamental structure.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Intelligent agents are the core processing units whose social capacities and interactions the paper analyzes.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper examines how multiple autonomous agents coordinate and cooperate within distributed systems.

triples.name: Communication protocol
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes how communication models enable cooperation and coordination between distributed agents.

triples.name: Cooperation
triples.relevance: The paper examines cooperation as a key element characterizing the association and interaction of agents.

triples.name: Problem solving
triples.relevance: Distributed problem-solving is the core task framework within which agents cooperate and communicate.
